summary: Brings back the rumors from oblivion. Every npc will tell you the newest gossip.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod every npc in Skyrim can tell you the newest rumors like in Oblivion. 
!!You have to enter and leave a house when you play the first time after you!! 
!!have installed the mod because if you dont do it there might be a bug, so  !!
!!you cant talk mit npcs.                                                                         !!

I dont know, if the dialoges are toned because i dont have an english skyrim
version, but the quests you get will work.

The screenshots are german, but with an English Skyrim-version the dialoge will be english.




German version: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21003




Contact: therobinhood@web.de




my other mods:

- Mehr Waffen und Ruestungen [Deutsch]: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16989
- Waffen und Rustungen schmelzen - melt down weapons and armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16933
- Die Schmieden von Himmelsrand: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15104
- EveryAxe: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15082
- Schwerelose Ausruestung: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15081
- Pfeile Schmieden: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15004
- Whiterun - bug fixes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20989
author: Robin Hood
